Text.Page: <PCNAME>, we're all grateful for your efforts to curb the tide of this recent invasion. I hope you're ready for a fight, because I need you in top fighting form for your next mission. <NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"What do you need me to do?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Nothing you haven't done for us in the past. Wipe out strange creatures, protect the weak, that sort of thing.
Already? You make things look too easy.
